metadata.title: CVE-2021-20286 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libnbd 1.7.3. An assertion failure in nbd_unlocked_opt_go in ilb/opt.c may lead to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-20286` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnbd-bin - 1.6.2-1
libnbd-ocaml - 1.6.2-1
libnbd0 - 1.6.2-1
python3-libnbd - 1.6.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libnbd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.2-1').
